    • Method Detail

      • scaleComponent

        public void scaleComponent(javax.swing.JComponent immediateComponent)
        A method to be called when this JTabbedPaneScaler has been dispatched to some immediate Component to be scaled. This tackles the problem that after a complete application scaling, through the ScalingSlider, further components, initialized posterior, are not scaled. In order to do so, attach a scaler and call this method upon initialization.
        Overrides:
        scaleComponent in class ComponentScaler
        Parameters:
        immediateComponent - to be scaled

      • coscaleIcon

      • coscaleFont

        public void coscaleFont(javax.swing.JComponent component)
        Description copied from class: ComponentScaler
        Scales all components that have their font not modified by the LAF-Scalers for one reason or another up to this point.
        Overrides:

        Parameters:

      • coscaleHTML

        public void coscaleHTML(javax.swing.JComponent component)
        Interface method for modifyHTML(JTabbedPane, int). Part of the HTML-supporting interface contract.

        Be careful to update the font too, because this is taken as basis and thus the end HTML scaling depends on it.

        Specified by:
        coscaleHTML in interface HTMLScaler
